modName: SILENT Bards - Stop the Singing Permanently
summary: Stops bards from singing. EVER. Option to also remove instrumental bard songs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/32412-1-1361848331.jpg[/img]
[size=5]SILENT Bards[/size][/center]

[size=4]I've tried a few mods that pretended they did something like this and didn't actually function properly. I've had enough of ill-timed 'musicians' yowling at the middle of the night keeping me awake (or any other time, for that matter) and often leaving me no other option but to twist their heads off. This mod simply replaces the audio and lip-motion .fuz files for the songs with a brief moment of silence, so don't ever expect to hear them sing ever again even if requested, unless you uninstall this.

A standalone, optional download also removes the audio for the instrumental songs if you want quiet inns, but the bard will still pretend to play the instrument... can't have everything. xD

Even works perfectly with Sven (in Riverwood) who is notorious for deciding to sing even though a mod tells him not to, something about how he REALLY likes having his throat pulled out.

[color=#48D1CC]Optional File: Muted Humming[/color][/size]
Completely mutes all humming in the game, done by request
_________________
